commands.name: az pipelines runs tag add
commands.summary: Add tag(s) for a pipeline run.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines runs tag add --run-id
                          --tags
                          [--detect {false, true}]
                          [--org]
                          [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines runs tag delete
commands.syntax:
az pipelines runs tag delete --run-id
                             --tag
                             [--detect {false, true}]
                             [--org]
                             [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines runs tag list
commands.summary: Get tags for a pipeline run.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines runs tag list --run-id
                           [--detect {false, true}]
                           [--org]
                           [--project]
